short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks focus time on your one chosen 'Focus Website' and blocks your attempts to open new tabs and windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tracks focus time on your chosen 'Focus Website', displays the last 7 days' record, and blocks your attempts to open new tabs and windows. This extension aggressively ensures that you remain within your one 'Focus Website' of your choice. This extension is activated only when you enter your 'Focus Website'. In order to deactivate the extension, close your Chrome window and re-open with shame and guilt.
